definition: abbr. for 野火燒不盡，春風吹又生|野火烧不尽，春风吹又生[ye3 huo3 shao1 bu4 jin4 , chun1 feng1 chui1 you4 sheng1]
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
lit. even a prairie fire cannot destroy the grass - it grows again when the breeze blows (proverb)/fig. cannot be easily eliminated/abbr. to 野火春風|野火春风[ye3 huo3 chun1 feng1]
pinyin: ye3 huo3 shao1 bu4 jin4 , chun1 feng1 chui1 you4 sheng1
related.word: 野火烧不尽，春风吹又生

definition: fire beacon (used as alarm signal over long distance)
willow tree/poplar and willow/name of traditional tune
autumn frost/fig. white hair as sign of old age
a single spark (idiom); an insignificant cause can have a massive effect
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
lit. wind rises, tide bubbles up/turbulent times/violent development (idiom)
lit. an ant trying to shake a tree/to overrate oneself (idiom)
lit. (cloud shapes) changing from a white shirt to a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
sad melody/stirring strains/elegy/dirge/threnody/sing with solemn fervor
